name: 2025 the 5th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Education
content: PUBLICATION: Submitted papers will be strictly reviewed by technical program committee. Accepted papers after successful registration and presentation will be included into Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted for index by Ei Compendex and Scopus. The authors of the papers will be invited to participate in the ICAIE to display their research results.
organizers: Academy of Future Education, Xiâ€™an Jiaotong-Liverpool University
